scoring_breakdown.hook_retention: 92 - Strong POV hook that immediately creates relatability
scoring_breakdown.algorithm_optimization: 88 - Excellent hashtag strategy and trending audio usage
scoring_breakdown.authenticity_factors: 85 - Genuine business scenario with real results
scoring_breakdown.entertainment_value: 90 - Perfect balance of education and entertainment

viral_video_analysis.primary_strengths: POV hook format (creates immediate engagement), results-focused content (builds credibility), save-worthy value (drives engagement)
viral_video_analysis.framework_1: POV-Problem-Solution: Point of view setup, problem identification, solution reveal. Action: Start with 'POV: You're a...'
viral_video_analysis.framework_2: Hook-Reveal-CTA: Attention grab, value delivery, engagement prompt. Action: Use strong opening statement
viral_video_analysis.framework_3: Story-Transformation-Proof: Personal narrative, change process, evidence of results. Action: Share specific metrics and outcomes

scoring_breakdown.algorithm_optimization: 85 - Good hashtag mix and verified creator authority
scoring_breakdown.authenticity_factors: 90 - Vulnerable sharing of real business failures

mistake_sharing_analysis.primary_strengths: Vulnerability hook (builds trust), specific consequences (creates urgency), learning framework (provides value)
mistake_sharing_analysis.framework_1: Mistake-Consequence-Lesson: Error admission, impact revelation, wisdom sharing. Action: Lead with specific number and cost
mistake_sharing_analysis.framework_2: Problem-Pain-Prevention: Issue identification, damage explanation, avoidance strategy. Action: Use concrete financial examples
mistake_sharing_analysis.framework_3: Experience-Learning-Teaching: Personal journey, insights gained, knowledge transfer. Action: Focus on actionable takeaways

scoring_breakdown.algorithm_optimization: 90 - Trending audio use and engagement-driving hashtags

routine_challenge_analysis.primary_strengths: Time-bound challenge (creates urgency), transformation promise (motivates action), community building (drives engagement)
routine_challenge_analysis.framework_1: Challenge-Duration-Outcome: Task presentation, time commitment, expected results. Action: Use specific timeframes
routine_challenge_analysis.framework_2: Routine-Benefit-Community: Habit introduction, value proposition, group participation. Action: Ask for community involvement
routine_challenge_analysis.framework_3: Quick-Win-Transformation: Simple action, immediate benefits, life change potential. Action: Focus on accessibility and results
